sentences.sContent: The so-called experts couldn’t tell us what was wrong.
sentences.sCn: 那些所谓的专家说不出问题出在哪里。

sentences.sContent: ...What does the speaker say about the so-called fixed expenses...
...The so-called mindful-eating strategies can fight distractions and help us control our appetite...

trans.tranOther: used to describe someone or something that has been given a name that you think is wrong
